text:
The Farmers’ Grievances Day meeting will be held at the Collector’s Office here on February 26. In a release here on Monday, S. Ganesh, District Collector, has appealed to the farmers to participate in it and get their grievances redressed.

Special camp

for vaccines

A special camp for administering vaccines to livestock to check the incidence of foot-and-mouth disease will be held from March 1 to 21. K. Nandakumar, District Collector, in a release here on Monday, has appealed to the livestock owners to ensure administration of vaccines to the animals.
title: Farmers’ grievance day
